description: Hinako Shinoda is a second-year employee at major publishing company "Sengokusha". She is ordered to transfer to the editorial department of the weekly magazine "Shuukan Sengoku", a place she wanted to avoid at all costs. As a rookie reporter, Hinako faces various scoops, such as entertainment news, embezzlement, and suspicious death cases.

title: Boots
overview: Bullied gay teen Cameron joins the Marine Corps with his best friend despite risks. In boot camp they experience profound personal change amid danger, as their platoon confronts both literal and figurative landmines.
